product_name: Topeak MTX TrunkBag EXP with Zip-Down Panniers
long_description: Whether you're riding a road or mountain bike, this rear, rack-mounted storage bag is great for commuting, errands and touring-this one has expandable side pockets. Features large-capacity main compartment; two side pockets open into pannier bags and multi-functional top pocket. Durable 2520-denier Cordura(R) Plus construction with 3M(R) reflective trim for increased visibility. Foam walls provide padding and insulation for use as a cooler or camera bag. Insulated main compartment holds up to eight 16 oz. cans. Built-in carrying handle, plus detachable shoulder strap. Quick and easy mounting with Topeak MTX QuickTrack(TM) system. Note: Topeak MTX Dual Side frame, sold separately, is required when using this product with a beam-type rack.
short_description: Whether you're riding a road or mountain bike, this rear, rack-mounted storage bag is great for commuting, errands and touring-this one has expandable side pockets.
